## DurableOperation.getWaitDetails() method

Gets the details for a wait operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getWaitDetails(): WaitResultDetails | undefined;
```

**Returns:**

[WaitResultDetails](./durable-execution-sdk-js-testing.waitresultdetails.md) \| undefined

The wait operation details, or undefined if no operation data is available

## Exceptions

Will throw an error if the operation type is not WAIT or if wait event details are missing
